name: Belle Epoque EP "Wicked Ones And Thieves"
description:

CURRENTLY SOLD OUT. AVAILABLE ON ITUNES.

1.  Wicked Ones and Thieves
2.  Have Fear...For It is Revealed
3.  We Are the Bold
4.  Keeping the Innocent
5.  And We Will Be Delivered

All of the orders are Handled by the band.  Please be patient.  Any questions or inquiries e-mail belleepoquebooking@yahoo.com


Shipping is $2.50 in the US and $5 outside the US.  Purchase the CD with any other item and save  money on shipping!!
